title: Clan Activity is Surging!
message: Total messages sent this week are up by a massive 58.8% compared to last week!

message: With 1212 messages sent in the last 30 days, @partymarty94 is keeping the chat alive!

message: With 825 messages and 496 kills in the last 30 days, you might want to step away from the screen for a bit!

title: Weekly Message Activity Surges!
message: Our clan's message count jumped by 68.4% this week, from 5893 to 9922 messages!

title: Sirgowi: The Yapper King!
message: Sirgowi led the charge with 585 messages and 4.9M XP gained this week, a true Top 5% yapper!

message: JakeSTL314, our Zenyte, only gained 261,550 XP and 3 kills this week. Step it up!

message: Tylenolchugr is a Top 5% XP earner with 19.8M XP and 1036 kills, but sent 0 messages. Touch grass!

message: Ares06 gained 10.4M XP this week but secured 0 boss kills and sent 0 messages. Where's the action?

message: S1ayde achieved an incredible 8.9M Prayer XP gain this week, securing a Top 5% XP rank!

message: Pointndclick built up 6.0M Construction XP this week, showing serious dedication!

title: Samaelilith: The Triple Threat!

title: Geoblocks34: Woodcutting Master!
